description: This source file implements functions for reading user input from the console within the SLAP framework, specifically for the Slap Bmc2 Input Object. It includes two functions: SlapBmc2InoRead for simple input reading, and SlapBmc2InoRead2 for input with additional UI features like masking and fixed size.

methods.name: char * SlapBmc2InoRead(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Reads user input from the console using the BMC2 ICE interface.

methods.name: char * SlapBmc2InoRead2(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pDefaultValue,SLAP_BOOL bSizeFixed,SLAP_BOOL bMaskInput,SLAP_UINT32 ulWidth)
methods.description: Reads user input with additional UI options such as default value, masking, and fixed size, via the BMC2 ICE interface.
